Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 100th & Cottage Grove, due to localized flooding near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, King Drive, 100th and Cottage Grove, due to localized flooding near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Woodlawn, 93rd, Cottage Gove & 95th, due to localized flooding near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Woodlawn, 93rd, Cottage Gove and 95th, due to localized flooding near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th & Cottage Grove, due to localized flooding near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th, then resume their normal route on Cottage Grove, due to localized flooding near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #106 East 103rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 103rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: EB 106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, then resume on their normal route, due to localized flooding near 103rd/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, then resume on their normal route, due to localized flooding near 103rd/Woodlawn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily bypassing Olive Harvey College, due to localized flooding near 103rd/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily bypassing Olive Harvey College in both directions, due to localized flooding near 103rd/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Polk
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Polk due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Polk due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at California.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Polk at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are requested between Polk and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
